text: Bhai pabha pulyaaliji lyubha lya kolokoya kwa Lyubha lya Pumulila. Kwa nneyo ikapinjikwaga iilu ilepeshe munshalabha Lyubha lya Pumulila, pabha lyene lyubhalyo pulyaaliji likulungwa, Bhayaudi gubhaajujilenje a Pilato bhakaatemanje makongono bhakomelenjwe munshalabha bhala nkupinga bhawanganje shangu, na iilu yabhonji ishoywe mmishalabha.
